entry.tran: (印度或伊斯兰国家的人弯腰并且右手掌置额前)行额手礼
entry.def: When someone salaams, they bow with their right hand on their forehead. This is used as a formal and respectful way of greeting someone in India and Muslim countries.

example.ex: He looked from one to the other of them, then salaamed and left.
example.tran: 他扫了他们每个人一眼，行了个额手礼就离开了。

entry.tran: (某些穆斯林的问候语)色拉姆，赛拉姆
entry.def: Some Muslims greet people by saying 'Salaam'.
